description:
The Kansei University track team miraculously makes it through the qualifier.
The team is inundated by club applicants and interview requests.
Despite them, Haiji calmly focuses on preparing for the race.
However, Jota and Joji suddenly begin to oppose him.
"Haiji`s fooling us, isn`t he?"
What misgivings weigh heavily on their minds?
Source: crunchyroll
